website_summaries.verdict: A rugged and simple pull-on boot for great protection.
pros: This lightweight pull-on boot keeps your feet safe and provides great traction
For something straightforward and long-lasting, this is a great option
cons: They may take a while to break in, and there is little padding or arch support

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line
customer_reviews.text: I had these Caterpillar pull on boots for approximately a year and these tough boots withstood working in a machine shop, the tread on it is worn but not bald, and the top portion took a while to rip. Started out as a small hole. Then I bought some Wal-Mart boots and had them for roughly about 3 months or less and the tread is starting to go bald. I recommend these Caterpillar pull on boots to anyone who is working in heavy duty industries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tough and long lasting, but takes awhile to break in
customer_reviews.text: Get ready for a few rough weeks while breaking these monsters in. I only wore Irish Settlers for years prior but figured I'd try these out because of the low price. I immediately missed my pre-fitted Red Wings. But once I broke them in I was a lot happier. Well made and they seem to be able to provide long wear life. Nothing fancy, light water resistance, anti slip soles, good ankle support. Over all a good boot for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, but they run very small
customer_reviews.text: These boots are well-made and durable but they run extremely small. They are made for narrow feet. These were purchased in one half size larger than needed, but they were so tight, they couldn't even be tried on. A person would have to purchase these at least one size larger than normally worn or even two full sizes larger. Manufacturers save money when they make their sizes smaller because they use fewer materials in the smaller sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Bleu Lorax

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed & returned
customer_reviews.text: Ordered through Prime Wardrobe - Normally wear a size 12. Ordered 11.5 wide. Tag on the boots received stated 11.5 wide but they fit like a pair of 13. Measured longer than a size 12 in a similar style of boot. Disappointed & returned. Update: Ordered second pair, size 11.5. Item arrived with obvious prior wear. Scuffs, scratches, and food splatter. The box its self the shoes were packaged in was damaged with cut marks and several feet of clear packaging tape. A very apparent fail by the Prime Wardrobe department on screening the previous customer's return.
customer_reviews.author: TitaanXL

customer_reviews.title: So far, very satisfied and happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent work boots! Bought these for my hard working hubby who has 2 jobs, where both require on your feet, lifting, tugging, pushing, surrounded by heavy machinery, object etc. He really liked the look of the boot and how light and comfy they are. His last pair we're almost double the price and still lasted @ 2 years. It appears these are just as durable and if they last 2 years we will be even more impressed! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Happymoon

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little large
customer_reviews.text: The pair I received from Amazon (not a third-party seller) showed clear, unambiguous signs of HEAVY prior use. I'm talking 6 months of wear, by my best guess. I can't believe Amazon accepted a return in that condition, and then sent it out to me! As for sizing, I suggest a half-size smaller than your regular shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Ragnar

customer_reviews.title: An excellent boot (just take them off before you go inside)
customer_reviews.text: These boots are super tough. I'm a really big guy, and my footwear gets punished. The arches had good support over a year, which is way longer that I usually get. My only complaint is that the sole "treads" on the heel are very square cut. Mud likes to stick in there and is very difficult to get out. I've often resorted to a hose with a brass nossel for the job. Other than the chewings I've taken over mud in the carpets, an excellent boot.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. McKee

customer_reviews.title: They run a little big.
customer_reviews.text: These Boots don't take that long to break in, but they do run a little big I typically wear a 10 and a half I bought a pair of 10s and they're still big. But all in all I put them through their paces and they're holding up really well in a solid industrial and welding environment
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Byrne

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy another pair.
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 8.5 in a gym shoe. I ordered these boots in a size 8. The boots are just a little roomy - but not roomy enough, to have to re-order in a smaller size. It is a work boot, I added a thin Dr. Scholl cushioning to the boot...it has a much better fit now. Feet are more snug in place, just right!
customer_reviews.author: napsan

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: I gor my work boots today way sooner than expected. I got them in a size 12 but should have gotten 11 1/2. But i always put in inserts so they fit just fine now. The quality is great and the feel is more than fine when I walk in them. They should make great work boots.
customer_reviews.author: W. P. Godwin Jr.

customer_reviews.title: The boots are fine, but the sizing is a little erratic
customer_reviews.text: The boots are fine, but the sizing is a little erratic. I bought Size 7 a few years ago, they wore out and I bought another pair of Size 7, they were so tight I could not get my foot in the boot. Bought some size 7.5 and they are also tight. Bought some Size 8 and they are in general the right size but my heel lifts and falls as I walk, so they tend to slap/drag as I walk. I do like the boots though.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Little large at first
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and he said it was a little large at first, but after he put the boot socks on, that I also bought him, he said they fit better. He loves them so much, he wanted to sleep with them on! LOL He works counstruction and was wearing only hiking boots,, when a large piece of glass when in thru his sole, deep into his foot, that required many sutures. Now he won't have to worry about that happening again ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kyle D.

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistency in production
customer_reviews.text: With a lot of work and leather conditioner, these boots are great. Petroleum kills the soul of them, and so they only last me about 6 months. The downfall of them is that they are the only boot I’ve ever had that inconsistently have to expand the left boot to make it fit correctly. Getting it on takes a pair of pliers because the pull loops break. My feet, ankles, and calves are the same size. Back to Danners is where I’m headed
customer_reviews.author: Adam K Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good boots
customer_reviews.text: Good quality boot. Only con is that it’s a pain to get tour foot in and out. We will see how the spot where your heel rubs/presses on holds up after repetitive use. It’s re-enforced but I can see the leather softening up already on that one spot after just 2 weeks of use or so.
customer_reviews.author: Mig Ru

customer_reviews.title: Only buy from Amazon, not third party
customer_reviews.text: I went through a couple pair of these trying to get the right fit, then ended up finding a different brand to buy. The third party seller lost my last order and refused to refund me. The boot quality seemed decent, but not the seller.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are way too big
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it back 3 times to get the right size. I wear an 11 but had to get a 9.5. Not sure if the liner will hold up but they don't have any arch support Update: The 9.5 was looser than the 10 on the same foot so I'll be returning for a 4th time and will not be repurchasing
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Sammuel Bliesner

customer_reviews.title: Simple and light, yet robustly made 'summer' work boot.
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has predominantly worn boots my entire life, and has bought some of (at the time) best production boots around, (Red Wings, Irish Setters when it comes to pull-ons) these boots are incredibly well made, simple and light in design yet still heavy duty. Now that my favorite Red Wings and Irish Setters have drastically declined in quality in later years, this unassuming boot easy qualifies as a great all-around boot. Pleasantly surprised and grateful to have a reliable pair of boots I can afford.
customer_reviews.author: Hoss

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and comfortable water tight boots
customer_reviews.text: These are just what my grandson needed for his construction job. He said these fit perfectly and exactly what he wanted. The inside lining makes them feel good and the outside is tough leather. He appreciates the grip on the soles which are safety standards.
customer_reviews.author: Trail reader

customer_reviews.title: I just like it
customer_reviews.text: I had buy the same pair boot about three year ago at a shopping mall,and i wear the boot two years ,some of my friends said it so ugly,but in fact I like it ,I don’t know why they don’t like it ,but it’s same one I bought by amazon ,I’m sure ,and cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Shicheng Sun

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Color and design are exactly as shown, however, they are super hard to get your foot in and out of, especially on the left boot. Took a couple of wears to break in a little, but they are still hard to get on and off, but are comfortable once on.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Irby

customer_reviews.title: they do and are very comfortable. However they take forever to break in
customer_reviews.text: I bought these praying they would fit, they do and are very comfortable. However they take forever to break in, so hoping that it takes longer to break them down. they dont come oiled.
customer_reviews.author: SafetySharon

customer_reviews.title: I should of sent them back right away instead of trying to make the work
customer_reviews.text: The boot is a very good looking boot but the steel toe was made to small & the back part of the steel rubs my 4th toe can’t wear them hurts after awhile
customer_reviews.author: Wes b

customer_reviews.title: Heel slips out and boot is too big
customer_reviews.text: Regular shoe size is 12. Bought size 12 in this boot (medium width) and it was too big and felt very wide. So we bought a half size smaller, 11.5 medium width. Heel continued to slip out of boot. If we were to go a half size smaller, it would be to tight on the toes and the foot would not fit in the shoe comfortably at the toes.
customer_reviews.author: FaithAndFamily

customer_reviews.title: Motorcycle riders friend
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for motorcycle riding as they were heavy-duty and had a high top so my pant leg wouldn't ride up exposing my shins. First impression upon sticking my foot in was they were lose and heavy. Well they are heavy (DUH, steel toe and lug sole), but the looseness turned out to be a misconception. After putting in a gel insert they are not loose one bit, and they are actually quite comfy to walk in / work in all day. That was a big surprise. They will probably be worn more in the winter due to their bulk, but man what a tuff, good looking boot.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Cod Joe

customer_reviews.title: Solid comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: The tops are so narrow that the boots are a little hard to get my feet into but they may loosen up. I bought a half size larger than normal. For all the protection that they provide, they don't feel too heavy. I wear them around my small ranch in East Texas especially for chain saw work and thorns. I would not ride horses in them. According to Caterpillar they have been discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor steeltoe design
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit perfectly when i got them, maybe even a little loose. After one months time though where the steel toe inside connects to the rest of the shoe loosened and began to rub against my pinky toes so bad it blistered, cut, and bled. Not sure why this happened i had just got them broke in maybe the glue came loose or theyre just poorly designed not sure. Disappointed and out a hundred dollars as they are no longer wearable
customer_reviews.author: dillon

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing better than a high quality leather boot. I purchased this for my father in-law for a Christmas gift. When I opened it I couldn't believe the quality and the smell of the leather was amazing. The oil finish was so well done there was residue still on the paper that was wrapped around the boot. Needless to say my father in-law I am sure thought this was a $200 dollar boot. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Tamra

customer_reviews.title: Welder boot and is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipment and comfortable. Purchased for a welder and is the perfect boot. Flame resistant and East off and on. Has had for over 7 months and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anaya Woodards

customer_reviews.title: New favorite boots
customer_reviews.text: For awhile I've been wearing my military combat boots loosely with civilian clothes, but I've been wearing them out doing so. Decided to give these a try, and I love them. They feel just like my steel toe combat boots, without the negative wear and tear. Leather is soft and feels great out of the box without break in. Oil resistant soles have plenty of grip. As recommended by previous reviews, I ordered a size smaller then normal, and they fit perfect. To be on the safe side, refer to the size chart they provide.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Hermanson

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Liked the boot just fine, I didn’t realize it’s not water proof and that’s what I needed, I work outside in the elements. This boot has been better than the Justin brand I bought previously.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: Way too large for listed size, but still a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Quality is still good, but the sizing is WAY OFF! I ordered this exact same brand, size and width as 3 years ago, and this one is almost a size too large and a half size too wide. Luckily Amazon's return system is very easy. My last order of this product was 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: S-417

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: My last boots were size 12 and lasted about 10 years. These boots look much nicer but a Caterpillar men's 11.5 would have been better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Firedragon

customer_reviews.title: Run big, but great long lasting boots!
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots they were just too big for me, I should have exchanged them for a smaller size but I tried to suck it up and now I can't return them. 12/10/15 I've had these boots for almost a year and they've held up very well, I work in a chemical plant and boots only usually last about 6 months here but aside from some scuffs and scrapes they're still in great shape. When these finally get worn completely out I'll be ordering again, this time a half size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Martin

customer_reviews.title: Best set of boots I have bought
customer_reviews.text: These boots have gone to hell and back with me. From Construction to the Military, money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: I would say this is you simple, normal yet great boot.
customer_reviews.text: Fitter/welder this boot is great. That being said it takes about 2 weeks to break them in, and if like me you work old and new metal and you are inside of barges or cutting plates on the floor, like with all my previous boots buy or get does toe caps that you glue to them for more durability. Other then that the boots are great it has been a month now, full time and overtime, and they are holding great.
customer_reviews.author: hector diaz

customer_reviews.title: Maybe your feet will fit better than mine...
customer_reviews.text: Reviews claim the boot runs small so I ordered a half size up . However, even allowing for that, the right boot fit okay while the left boot was too small to even get it over my arch. Highly inconsistent sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Get a Sole insert and wear good socks, order 1 size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: With a good insole insert and the right socks, and going 1 size smaller, they fit just fine. Good leather, only one small aberration on the toe of the rubber sole. Boots came in with what looked like someone lightly drug a fork over the top of the shoe, but was nominal all in all. Had it polished up at the barber shop and it looks good now. Was dissapointed that I had to put in a little bit of work right out of the box. Not enough to detract from the rating though. Shoe shine was 2 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph DLS

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of boots.
customer_reviews.text: Boots feel pretty good. I did go up a size after reading they run small. I have tried numerous brands and these are the first pair that fit very well. I am in need of another pair here soon and I will order here again.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Go with true size.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these now going on just over a month. After a short break-in period I realized that other reviews were wrong. I got a half size larger and were to large. Other than that great boots!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear these every day, but I like them for when I travel to factories that require steel toes. They are easy to slip on and off at the airport. Also very easy to slip on when I have to walk the dog in the snow or something. They do take some breaking in though, and they gave me some blisters the first time i wore them, but that's what you get for walking 3 miles the first day go get them. Any boot is going to do that.Make sure to get some thick wool socks and that will help. so far they are a good boot.
customer_reviews.author: gnick

customer_reviews.title: Steel toes moved on
customer_reviews.text: The steel toe started moving inside the boots after two months use. Amazon refunded. Going to try a different manufacturer. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great, However...
customer_reviews.text: Great work boots for the price! However, to make them go from great to outstanding you’ll need some higher-end insoles. I know, I know - still it’s worth it. Once I placed some insoles inside and on top of the insoles already in place of these boots, they felt rock solid.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Do it! Buy them! They’re amazing
customer_reviews.text: My husband literally sighed with relief when he slid these on and hasn’t complained about his feet hurting in weeks! Even though he’s breaking them in he said they feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Get some insoles to go with these.
customer_reviews.text: A little loose fitting and not very slip resistant. Overall I don't hate them, but I guess I was hoping for something a little better. I think a good pair of insoles will go along way towards improving these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer 1345643386

customer_reviews.title: Decent boots for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like the newer CAT boots, however the last pair I had purchased (very similar to these) must have been a slightly better build of boot. These ones are not water-proof at all, I should have read the review more closely I suppose before making the purchase. I am a heavy equipment field mechanic and these do not do well in water/snow at all, since new. Otherwise good fitting, sturdy boot.
customer_reviews.author: Cushaway

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Writing my review after just one day wearing these boots. Feels fine after all day wear. A good generic design. I would recommend these boots.
customer_reviews.author: TeamLentz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots are great needs more walking in them they're really stiff but really comfortable
customer_reviews.author: florin balalau

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: I really like this boot. Will see how long they last work in a mechanic shop
customer_reviews.author: James C

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots. Not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Leaked a little after very heavy water but has been a good pair of boots. The fit good and didn't need to be worn alot to be confortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Sheedy

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking boot...sized small
customer_reviews.text: Great product and look, just too small, but refunded promptly with no questions
customer_reviews.author: Bird

customer_reviews.title: NICE BOOT
customer_reviews.text: Christmas Present for nephew who works on his feet in a machine shop. Fit well
customer_reviews.author: NHEN

customer_reviews.title: really nice boot otherwise
customer_reviews.text: They definitely run large. the heel was to low for my liking. really nice boot otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Stormsailor1

customer_reviews.title: Steel toe
customer_reviews.text: Well the boot looks and fits good. I've been jumping around from ariats, red wings, justins.. see how these do compared to them.
customer_reviews.author: Evyn Fraley

customer_reviews.title: Order Small
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is really weird with these boots, but they are comfortable when you find the right one. I wear a 12-1/2 or 13 depending on the brand of shoes and read a lot of reviews that said to buy small so I went ahead and bought a size 12 regular. When I tried them on, they were way too big so I replaced them with 11-1/2 regulars. Now one boot won't fit and the other is way too tight. Replaced them again with 11-1/2 extra wide. Finally, a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg M.

customer_reviews.title: Good boot for the bucks!
customer_reviews.text: Decent boot for a hundred bucks. Comfortable. Fits as posted.
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming Rick

customer_reviews.title: ... far I have no complains sense they fit almost like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I have being waring this boots for 3 days so far I have no complains sense they fit almost like a glove. I have a size 12 and that's what I ware on running shoes. When winter comes I think this boots will fit even better because I feel they are loosening and becoming perfect for thick socks.maybe if I would still be alive in the future icwill
customer_reviews.author: Arias E

customer_reviews.title: Good quality boot
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and feel good. Good quality boot. Size was about .5 larger than expected. So I recommend ordering slightly smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my husband last year. He definitely has put use to them. His only complaint was that they rub on his outside toes and created a pretty big callous.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I need the wide for my toes, but not my heel, so the boots were a little loose. I bought some insoles and they seem to help
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Winkelmann

customer_reviews.title: They comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My cousin like a very strong durable and very comfortable boots
customer_reviews.author: roselia

customer_reviews.title: Best boot for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best boot for the price.I got cat boots before they hit the market (2 pair , as a tester) I can tell you that as a general contractor I thrash boots & cat boots have been among the longest lasting I have had. These boots are as good or better than some boots costing twice as much
customer_reviews.author: Starlight Express

customer_reviews.title: Color is wrong but the boot seems great
customer_reviews.text: It seems strange that no one is mentioning the color discrepancy. Perhaps mine were a fluke. Anyway the boots seem great in every aspect that I care about. I am posting a cell phone shot of the boot that should show up in the pic gallery. Its not a bad color, just significantly darker than the stock pictures. The fit is great and they seem tough. I've had CAT footwear before and they've been exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Logan B. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Steel is bent cutting toes.
customer_reviews.text: This product is good. However. The steel toe portion is curved in on the right side boot and is cutting the toe next to the little toe. It is painful and no way to fix it. Other than that I love the boots.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: lasted 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I work in the oilfields so these were just what I needed. They fit and look great. Wearing my second pair in a year and will not buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Waldorf my job I do a lot of welding and cutting
customer_reviews.author: Matthew camp

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable but sole is separating from the boot when there is still lots of tread
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Good Work Boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are good quality and pretty comfortable. They did need to break in a little, they rubbed the inside bone on my ankle for a week until the leather around the ankle softened up but now I really enjoy wearing them. The left boot is slightly tighter than the right as well. Overall, I do like them and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Color was NOTHING like pictured
customer_reviews.text: Boots seem heavy duty and Nice....but I ordered the Dark Brown, which appears to be a lighter color in the picture....and the regular "Brown" seems very dark. I think they have them mixed up in the descriptions. The boots I received are super DARK brown....almost black.....which is NOT what my Son wanted.....and NOT what is depicted in the photo above, so I will have to exchange them.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L. Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very wide. Ordered 11W. You'd need very wide feet for this too fit right. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great work boots
customer_reviews.text: Husband on 3rd pair of these. Great for working in shops. They last him about a year with daily use. Sides blow out around the year mark but toes still in great condition as well as soles. For welders, they kick off pretty easily in case the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: cmirrione

customer_reviews.title: Love These Boots!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these boots multiple times over the years and they have lasted me years only thing they did not hold up to was my dogs tearing them up. Sole stayed like new for years used them for hunting, yard work, carpentry, everything outside. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Good boot, poor handles.
customer_reviews.text: Boots fit and feel great even with extended wear on my large flat feet. Only issue is the very first time I put them on, one of the pull loops broke immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Garbage I ordered these to replace my carhartts that they quit making and they are garbage there is no liner at all in the top half they were way too loose I ordered my normal size I put them on once then took them right back off
customer_reviews.author: Jamie P.

customer_reviews.title: Good boot for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like these boots. The wore in great. In September it will be a year of me wearing them. I work 12 hour days M-F on hard surfaces. The only issue I have is the right boot on the inside starting coming apart in June. Other than that great boots
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Good boot for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good boot for the price. My son is a big guy and goes through boots pretty fast so we needed a boot that isn't overly expensive and still somewhat comfortable. We have ordered these boots a few times and they last him about 6 months each so far.
customer_reviews.author: PNad

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: A great price for a full leather steel toed boot. Sizes run big, so you will likely need a half to full size smaller. The exchange process is very simple. Amazon even shipped the smaller pair before receiving the return (just make sure you are ordering from Amazon, and not an Amazon market partner as each partner sets its own return and exchange rules). I wear the boots occasionally, and would probably pay the extra money for redwings if I wore them all day, every day.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Hubby shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband in a size 9. He usually buys lace ups in a 9, however he stated he should have bought the pull ons at an 8.5 as they are loose from heal to toe, but the rest of the shoe fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Berhorst

customer_reviews.title: Boots 🥾 good  color , quality , 👌👌👌
customer_reviews.text: very good boots, all leather, resistant for any job, for the price I think they are very good, good quality 💪👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. Had them about 8 months and they are holding up pretty well. I'd buy them again. The leather is top notch. The tread is awesome. They are very comfortable and 100% waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great As of Day 1
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed new work boots after the soles of both his previous once came off after 3 years of use. He has only worn these one day so far but he says they fit great. Snug but not too tight. They haven't torn his feet up yet which he was expecting since they are new boots and he is used to breaking them in. Time will tell how they break in and hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Spark

customer_reviews.title: Never disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Caterpillar always makes amazing boots only thing is I wish they would make waterproof boots and not water resistant other than that exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Lacy Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These are great boots, I wear them everyday doing construction. They are a little big so make sure to order a size smaller than you usually wear. Other than that they are a great value. Will buy again if the pair i bought wear out which doesn't appear to be anytime soon
customer_reviews.author: Mason wampler

customer_reviews.title: Buy them now.
customer_reviews.text: Best construction boots I have owned. I baked them in the oven at 170 for 10 minutes then applies a mink oil and wax to make sure they were treated and waterproofed. So far they have outlasted every other boot my crew uses. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: All Bad
customer_reviews.text: These boot are already leaking water into the boot between sole and boot @steel toe insert i ordered them January 27, 2017 and today is March 31,2017
customer_reviews.author: Will Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great work boots
customer_reviews.text: Great work boots...I work in all kinds of weather ice, snow, wind, rain, and heat feet are always dry...I am a delivery driver for Nestle DSD and deliver frozen pizzas and ice cream and havent slipped one time since wearing these boots, my trailer is always -15 degrees....It is a good price for a good boot
customer_reviews.author: Roger M. Charles

customer_reviews.title: Broken shoes
customer_reviews.text: Hi i brought new CAT shoes from you, i have only worn them plus minus a month and they are broken in the middle of the souls on both feet. I would like to know if it will be replaced...
customer_reviews.author: JJ Liebenberg

customer_reviews.title: This is a great, comfortable, stylish boot.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great, but run LARGE. I wear and ordered size 10EE, which was much too large. I returned them and ordered a full size lower, 9EE - which fit absolutely perfect. The return process was simple and easy, a few clicks and I was done. I highly recommend these boots (buy them from Amazon, they have free shoe shipping/ returns on shoes.- If you buy from outside Amazon you may have to pay return shipping yourself) Totally comfortable, no arch supports needed, no blisters, can wear them all day no problem. They appear to be well made and are definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Burt

customer_reviews.title: GREAT boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my husband, and he is a hard fit. He was nervous a about the size being accurate, but he said that they fit perfect. He wore them the whole first day he received them and said they were as comfortable as his Tony llamas. He told me one was a little tight to get on, but they were perfect once he got them on. He told me the color was perfect for someone who was looking for a rustic look. They are sturdy, you cannot even feel the steel toe, and they are already broken in. No blisters from these boots due to breaking them in.
customer_reviews.author: justkeepinup

customer_reviews.title: Great buy a little loose
customer_reviews.text: This boots were a little large but my husband wears extra socks anyway so they were a great buy! He is a plumber and loves them for being on his feet all day was the best boots ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed got these some boots in 2017 and can still wear. Bought this boots in March 2020 and already falling apart leather is coming off toes and very poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: They need to be cared for like any leather boots
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the last pair i had that i worr out over 2-3 years. Just slipped the old ones off, took out the insoles i had in there; put em in the new ones and proceeded to work and kick ass and even ride my electric skateboard in these babies
customer_reviews.author: William Harper

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots but Starting to fall apart after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I want to say that I love these boots. But they are starting to fall apart and I dont think I've even had them for 3 months. They fit amazing are super comfortable with the inserts that I have. But the sole is starting to come off of the bottom of the boot.
customer_reviews.author: William Farmer

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: a year old and holding up great, basically slippers at this point, you can get a better more comfortable pair of boots but these are awesome durability for the price, obviously steel toe can irritate the toes for a while
customer_reviews.author: that one guy

customer_reviews.title: Work all day
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he loves them. I wasn't sure how if they'd be OK compared to other boots he's had but I did good!! :-) He states they are comfortable to wear all day for work and his feet feel just fine at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyn

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Boots seem to be good quality, cheapest price I could find. Only issue is lack of support for feet and arches and they seem to be sized a little small. I find my pinky toe feeling pinched while walking sometimes, and I'm on my feet for 12 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Hobbick

customer_reviews.title: Buy this boots!
customer_reviews.text: These are best boots I've ever bought. I deliver gasoline and by far this is the longest wearing boot. Very comfortable Roomy. Don't waste your money buying more expensive thinking they will last longer cause I can tell u,they won't outlast these. I just received my fourth pair and I can't wait to start wearing them. Hands downs I love em'
customer_reviews.author: Elias

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Will work great for almost a year before issues start arising with your feet and back
customer_reviews.author: Mike T.

customer_reviews.title: Great boot for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband for Christmas and he loves them. I was skeptical about the size being accurate because he didn’t get to try them on, but they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lentz

customer_reviews.title: Much Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much from these boots. I wasn't paying much and we all know you get what you pay for. I don't remember the description stating these are water proof, but, when I stepped into the muddy mess up to my calves the other day not having wet feet was a nice surprise. Now, if only someone would come up with water proof jeans...
customer_reviews.author: Don Simpson

customer_reviews.title: I got a 7 which is good. It was so easy to return the boots ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the sized 8, which is what I typically wear because they were very large. Even looked huge. I got a 7 which is good. It was so easy to return the boots and get my new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Burner

product_meta.title: Caterpillar Men's Revolver Pull-On Steel Toe Work Boot
product_meta.description:
Don't let the simple construction of Caterpillar's Revolver boot fool you; it's designed to serve and protect. With its full-grain leather upper, Goodyear welt construction, steel toe, and electric-hazard and slip-resistant outsole, it's got you covered.

As the world's foremost manufacturer of heavy equipment, Cat earthmovers are known around the world as a symbol of honest work, strength and integrity. Cat Footwear makes boots and shoes based on these same principals. The brand has evolved from work boots into a range of industrial and casual footwear built with the sole purpose of staying true to their original goal--creating genuine, hard-working boots and shoes.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately Mid Calf" from arch
Slightly distressed steel-toe boot in full-grain leather construction
Dual pull handles with contrast logo patch
Nylon Mesh Lining ; P89516 Taibrelle + Pu Sock Liner ; PVC Midsole ;T3 Outsole
